articles.name: Dirt Block
articles.description: A block found abundantly in most biomes under a layer of grass blocks at the top of the Overworld.

articles.name: Grass Block
articles.description: A natural block that generates abundantly across the surface of the Overworld.

articles.name: Coarse Dirt Block
articles.description: A variation of dirt on which grass block cannot spread.

articles.name: Diamond Hoe
articles.description: A tool used to till dirt and grass blocks, made from diamond.

articles.name: Redstone Dust
articles.description: A mineral that can transmit redstone power when placed as a block

articles.name: Raw Iron Ore
articles.description: A raw metal resource obtained from mining iron ore.

articles.name: Ender Pearl
articles.description: An item dropped by Endermen used to teleport and to make an eye of ender.

articles.name: Goat Horn
articles.description: An item dropped by goats. It has eight variants, and each plays a unique sound when used which can be heard by players in a large radius.

articles.name: Glow Ink Sac
articles.description: An item dropped by a glow squid upon death. Unlike regular ink sacs, it can be added to signs to make glowing text, and can be used to craft glow item frames.

articles.name: Pumpkin Pie
articles.description: A food item that can be eaten by the player.

articles.name: Poisonous Potato
articles.description: A type of potato that can be eaten and can poison the player.

articles.name: Rabbit Stew
articles.description: A food item that can be eaten by the player.
